r.d: Finally, a tidy documentation tool for PHP projects. Yarrow shreds your PHP code files and converts their structure into user friendly API documentation.
r.n: removing docs that are duplicated in gh-pages bumping alpha version to 0.0.4 a default theme with PHP templates nudges to get the entire process working end to end nudges to get the entire process working end to end getting input and output targets working with console script adding basic configuration map refactoring and formatting docblocks console script returns proper exit values adding exit values to the cli script support for --config option refactoring console runner to use instance rather than static methods refactoring properties parser adding boolean properties support (fixes #1) better code formatting all parsing pushed inside the do/while loop folding up methods into single line parse method refactoring properties parser to use abstract scanner adding YARD tag notes
